detailsData.title: 30+ Years Experience
detailsData.content: With more than 30+ years of combined experience, founding partners Daniel Johnson and Juan Garcia bring a wealth of knowledge and expertise to the table.

detailsData.title: Bilingual Staff
detailsData.content: Johnson Garcia LLP offers a bilingual staff, ensuring that both English and Spanish speaking clients can receive the help they need without language barriers.

detailsData.title: Contingency Billing
detailsData.content: Clients are not required to pay any fees unless Johnson Garcia LLP wins their case, providing financial peace of mind during the legal process.

detailsData.title: Award-Winning Attorneys
detailsData.content: The firm's attorneys have been recognized for their hard work and dedication to their clients, making them a trusted choice for legal representation.

valueProp: The Johnson Garcia LLP law firm was established with the sole objective of helping clients recover their damages after an injury. With more than 30+ years of combined experience, founding partners Daniel Johnson and Juan Garcia are experienced Houston personal injury lawyers who have represented some of the world’s largest companies in some of the most complex business and personal injury disputes and related catastrophes.

testimonalData.text: Juan Garcia is tough. He understands how to fight and doesn’t give an inch to insurance companies until he gets what he thinks you deserve. I recommend him and his firm to anyone!
testimonalData.author: Amy W.

testimonalData.text: Daniel helped me solve a very challenging business dispute. He was aggressive, responsive, and got done exactly what I needed! I strongly recommend he and his firm to anyone who has a serious legal fight on their hands.
testimonalData.author: Michael B.

testimonalData.text: Juan and Daniel are top notch. They know how to fight and get results. They used to represent the biggest companies in the world and you can tell because they know how to exert leverage on the other side to get the best outcome. Definitely recommend these guys!
testimonalData.author: Carla K.
